experience: You and Wayne both know Ed Nusbaum, Sean Sheppard, and 76 others
Dream Teams: The Characteristics of Billion-Dollar Startup Founders
Founding Partner GrowthX Academy and Lead Instructor for UX Design Track

GrowthX Academy trains individuals who want to transition into a career in Sales and Business Development, Growth Marketing or UX Design. Each program is an immersive, 12-week experience located onsite at Galvanize in San Francisco. Our world-class instructors are entrepreneurs, founders, business owners and investors who teach the skills, mindsets and frameworks necessary in today’s competitive environment. GrowthX Academy delivers dynamic curriculum, personal and professional branding, hands-on experience working alongside real companies and immersion into our network of student peers, instructors, mentors, events, startups and investors. The GrowthX Academy Career Canvas Funnel™ helps you find the job you love at a company you’ll love working at.

GrowthX provides seed-stage venture capital and market development expertise to a select group of startups seeking product-market fit and predictable revenue. Our focus is on helping the entrepreneur make money - not raise money - and we've got it down to a science. Products and markets are unique, but the path to product-market fit and growth is not.

Kydak is an experience design company located in Tempe, AZ, part of the Phoenix metropolitan area. We use human-centered design approaches to create highly desirable, usable and useful experiences for mobile, web, products and services. Kydak solves complex interaction problems while connecting your business with your customers. We integrate innovation, design and interaction processes to help you create differentiated, profitable and beautiful solutions for the marketplace. Kydak has been acquired.

ShoppingScout is a web and mobile app that helps you save time, money and effort on your grocery shopping. Our proprietary comparison shopping engine leverages multiple sources and the ShoppingScout community to find the best value on groceries across local stores and online retailers, maximizing savings on your entire shopping list. Our product database also contains product ingredients and nutrition information on over 2 million supermarket items.
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
Human Computer Interaction track specializing in software design, usability, UX architecture and web design

Director of Demand Generation, Sales Division at IPsoft
January 31, 2012, Steve reported directly to Wayne

I worked with Wayne to build a pipeline valued at $75M in revenue.  Wayne has an extraordinary ability to take extremely complex business solutions and craft messaging in business terms and business value that resonate with a target audience.  He is very adept in rationalizing the prospect landscape, delivering a catered value proposition (going beyond a “one size fits all” message) which ultimately increased the probability of closed deals right out of the gate. Wayne is a top professional always focused on delivering value and is a pleasure to work for. I have worked with Wayne at two companies and would not hesitate to work with him again.

UX Program Director, UX Design Leader, UX Mentor

Julia is one of the best colleagues I’ve every worked with. She is smart, organized, efficient and gets shit done! She is also a kind-hearted soul that cares about people yet holds them accountable. Julia is a self-reported UX geek. She knows everything about the subject and field and has taught it for many years. She lives and breathes UX Design 24/7. Julia has created the UX Design Program at GrowthX Academy including the curriculum, format and projects. She continually innovates and iterates the program based on student feedback and observation. Julia has created a high standard of education at GrowthX Academy which we’re all very proud. Julia volunteers to do extra work even though she has a full schedule. She is a total team player and cares about the success of the team/company more than herself. She also goes to great extent to create a culture activity planning events, get togethers and celebrating birthdays. In short she is amazing!

Jie is a dedicated and talented UX designer. She is curious and works extremely hard to solve a problem. She is fearless. At Kydak she conducted usability testing from recruiting to final results, sketching, wire framing, prototyping and some visual design. She can also break into the code when needed to see what is going on. Jie would do well on any UX team whether in an agency or corporate setting. We will miss Jie at Kydak and wish her the best in S.F.!

summary: Accomplished executive with a broad set of business/sales/marketing/product and user experience (UX) design management skills through twenty-two years experience in both large multi-national and startup companies. Proven track record of delivering products to market by integrating the business and user requirements to produce profitable, usable, useful and compelling experiences. Dynamic, entrepreneurial leader who utilizes creative ideation, communication and multidisciplinary teamwork to deliver exceptional, innovative results. Lifelong curiosity in how the world is designed and unrelenting passion to make it a better place to live, work, learn and play.Specialties:•	Service design•       Experience design•	Ethnography•	Usability testing•	Design thinking•	User interface design•	Segmentation analysis and persona development•	Branding and messaging development•	Consultative selling methods•	Design facilitation•	Go-to-market execution•	Sales and business development
name: Wayne Neale
